title: Ticket #3328: Create a DAGManNodesMask test
description:
We should create at a test that makes sure that DAGManNodesMask filters out the right events from the DAGMan node job log, but also that those events still get into the log file specified by the job's submit file.

I'm not sure what event is the easiest to "artificially" create to test this -- maybe ULOG_ATTRIBUTE_UPDATE? (I don't think we necessarily have to test every event we're trying to filter out, but at least one...)
creator: wenger
